sqls.sql: select t.group_code,t.count_num , '${year}' ,'${employeeId}' from ( select m.group_code, count(1) as count_num from sys_t_lov_member m group by m.group_code ) t where t.count_num > 10 and t.count_num < 200
select p.c_pro_model,count(1) as count_num from crm_t_product_basic p where p.c_pro_model is not null and p.c_pro_model!=' ' group by p.c_pro_model
